name: flaunt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to show or make obvious something you are proud of in order to get admiration: He's got a lot of money but he doesn't flaunt it. Flavio was flaunting his tan in a pair of white trunks. flaunt yourself
UK to show your body in a confident and sexual manner: She was criticized for flaunting herself on the beach in front of the media. I hope they didn't think I was flaunting myself! They accused her of flirting with the singer and flaunting herself. He clearly set out to upstage the leader, flaunting himself in front of the cameras. He certainly wasn't averse to flaunting himself on stage.
